channel.title: MapEditor/Viewer V0.4B *Videos
channel.description:
Hello,
Well this is the V0.4B of the mapeditor and viewer:)
Video of it
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CrdtHDMJNrA
Info about V0,4B
Basicly it loads the map region around that area you load basicly if you load h0x59y49 it will load the region around it..
Heres a picture of that [img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/4360/ss20080907231428vw0.png[/img]
The landscape now dosnt load as square boxers.. it loads correctly like runescape maps are spouse to :)
[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/682/ss20080907231531xo7.png[/img]
And then we got edge with texture support
[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/6289/ss20080907231618kl8.png[/img]
<3 T X, Cellky
We might sell this program.. Pm me if you are intrested

item.dc:creator: @BuyMyJunk BuyMyJunk
item.description:
@BuyMyJunk wrote:

KO9:

What’s wrong with a landscape editor? Means people can add new places to the world…

then there will tons of threads like “how do i edit landscape”, “cant get landscape editor to work”, “look at my good new landscape i created”, “look at the most advanced server around” and so on
only good to come from it is being used by sucessfull servers like yours, and a few others

item.title: MapEditor/Viewer V0.4B *Videos
item.dc:creator: @Ian Ian
item.description:
@Ian wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:14, topic:230209”][quote author=Ian link=topic=302996.msg2431021#msg2431021 date=1220870574]

Chances are, Cellkyborg is behind this, not you.
[/quote]U funny monkey… Just like everythink behide darkquest isnt it… Lets think alex? says he made everythink for the client evan the clan chat and he dosnt no basic java? there again i no you made that… Alex and you are just fakes sorry to say peter

T x, at least they aren’t retarded morons who can’t even spell properly. I’ll admit this looks nice and useful - but you’re still a cock.

Spelling corrections:

everythink = everything
behide = behind
U = You
isnt = isn't
Lets = Let's
alex? = Alex
evan = even
dosnt = doesn't
no = know
java = Java
i = I
peter = Peter

Sorry to say thats kinda old now mate you really think it effects me? lol its just because when i was on ur irc u couldnt cope with me pwning u all the time in the way of java terms and first u saying u cant do delphi editors? Lol i pitty you

Can’t wait till you apply for a IT job somewhere.
“Languages you know:
java, PHP, 1337speak, inglish”

Quite ashame peter i actualy do work for a IT company in liverpool lawl but really its more funnyer because iam a administar and most probly get payed more than you? and btw all IT jobs dont need you to write up shit how about PC world? as a techguy rofl

I find that highly doubtful as you can’t even spell administer, how the fuck do you log into the administrator account? “Uh gaise, I how do you spell admeenasstratoor again???”

Secondly, how is this you owning me?

12:38 < T_x> Lawl
12:38 < T_x> if u going to program
12:38 < T_x> learn it first
12:38 <&KO9> says you
12:38 < T_x> K09
12:38 <&KO9> you don’t know fuck all about me
12:38 <&KO9> the server
12:39 <&KO9> or anything
12:39 < T_x> do u evan no what delphi or opengl is
12:39 <&KO9> so shut the fuck up chatting like you know shit
12:39 < T_x> erm i do no shit lol
12:39 <&KO9> what has delphi or OpenGL got to do with rsc
12:39 < T_x> the thing is
12:39 < T_x> Alot of things
12:39 <&KO9> delphi is wank
12:39 < T_x> u can make editors out of them lele
12:39 <&KO9> and rsc doesn’t use OpenGL
12:39 < T_x> http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,302269.0.html <— pwns u for starts
12:39 <&KO9> failtard
12:39 < T_x> Wow
12:39 < T_x> ur retarded mate
12:39 < T_x> U can make a editor out of them mate
12:39 <&KO9> k wow
12:39 < T_x> all u need is the commene sence and shit u nig
12:39 <&KO9> Learn to type
12:39 <&KO9> fucking spanner
12:39 <%xEnt> T_x he does have a point, its not OpenGL
12:39 < T_x> Learn to program?
12:40 -!- mode/#rsca [+b *!roject-50@.CDE85053.DF4EB7A9.IP] by KO9
12:40 <%xEnt> you can make an editor out of DX

Being able to make a landscape editor in delphi using opengl does mean RSC has anything to do with either of the two.

You could make an editor out of c/c++/c#/vb6/vc++/java/python/ETCETERA and use DirectX or d3d for the display, clue up.[/quote]

The question is why did u edit that chat due to the fact xEnt said u can make it out of it… Lawl the question there again is your geting jealous
